divs: Sighting Detailswas walking across the street to the store from work on a break. walking and facing the north northwest, a flying source that resembled a shooting star caught my eye. it was approx 930 in twilight and the sighting was atthe point where the pink sky of the sunset met the greenish blue. the flight of the object seemed to fly in the same direction i was walking, north northwest. the trail of the light was about 6 inches in view and the light seemed to disappear, extremely fast in tothe distance, rather than burning out or flicker out. the timeframe from the point it caught my eye to its disappearance was maybe 2 seconds no longer. also the sighting was above the treeline and no building or object obstructed any view of its path
Summary: extremely fast shooting star like object had surface in front of tailing llight
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in New Castle
There were no other sightings in New Castle on or around August 10th 2011
